author: faraz3920
content: Also can someone confirm EdDSA is NOT  supported  as a signature algorithm for ethereum

author: _shemnon
content: Edwards generally speaking is not.  It's all ECDSA when public/private keys are involved.  Since EdDSA does not have public key extraction (IIUC) it is not a simple rip and replace to go to edwards, none of the transaction formats support a public key, it's all implied from the ecdsa signature.
